description: Export structured data about your Terraform resources. More information: https://developer.hashicorp.com/terraform/cli/commands/output.

useCases.description: With no additional arguments, output will display all outputs for the root module:
Output only a value with specific name:
Convert the output value to a raw string (useful for shell scripts):
Format the outputs as a JSON object, with a key per output (useful with jq):
